title: Tom Freund Is Oddly Upbeat In 'Two Moons'
teaser: California-based troubadour Tom Freund sings of skateboarding kids, impending doom and Happy Days lunch boxes on his new album, Two Moons. NPR's Lynn Neary talks to him about the record.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
